name: Eviction Defense Form
description: Form for responding to an eviction notice and asserting tenant rights

sections.title: 3. Eviction Notice Details
4. Rental History
5. Defense Information
6. Response
sections.content: I, {tenant_name}, hereby deny the allegations contained in the eviction notice and assert my rights as a tenant under applicable state and local laws. I request a hearing to present my defenses to the eviction action.

sections.title: 7. Declaration
